post.text: I love our supporters -- so much spirit! Thank you Cleveland, Ohio --- VOTE TRUMP/PENCE on 11/8/16. Lets WIN & MAKE AMERICA GREAT AGAIN!

comment.author: Alan
comment.text: Most women think Donald Trump is a 2. At best. :-) An old ugly guy? Which woman would be attracted by that - except she is after the money. Think about that - sorry, you Trumpidiots cant think... :-) Anyway... stupid white male losers! :-)
